hymn.title: Son of Man, Son of Man on the throne today
hymn.category: Experience of Christ—As the Son of Man on the Throne

layout.singingstanza: Son of Man, Son of Man on the throne to -- day; Son of Man, Pi -- o -- neer, He has led the way; Fol -- low -- ing, how we sing, Je -- sus leads us on; We are march -- ing with the Vic -- tor to the throne.

lyrics.stanza: Called as sons, called as sons, destined to be kings; Called as sons we've no time for the worldly things: Yet we know, it is so—we don't qualify! Thus the Lord must search and burn and purify.

With the Man, with the Man is a rainbow fair; Glorious bow, 'round the throne, faithfulness declares: We deserved to be served with God's judgment sore, But we have been spared to praise Him more and more.
